definition: organizational committee/abbr. for 組織委員會|组织委员会
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
Olympic organizing committee/abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會|奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

sentences.english: What is the website of the Guangzhou Asian Games Organizing Committee?
sentences.chinese: 廣州亞組委網址是什麼？

sentences.english: The OCOG may establish a functional area dealing with Recruitment aspects.
sentences.chinese: 組委會可以設立專門的職能部門辦理招聘有關事宜。

sentences.english: Sun Weide, spokesman for the Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee, has urged that the Games not be politicized.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧組委發言人孫維德呼籲不要將奧運會政治化。

sentences.english: The local organising committee responded this week with a "green goal" initiative.
sentences.chinese: 當地組委會本週以一個“綠色目標”倡議做出迴應。

sentences.english: The OCOG may establish a functional area dealing with Transport aspects.
sentences.chinese: 組委會可以建立專職部門處理有關交通方面的事務。

sentences.english: Officials from the Beijing Olympics organizing committee saw the show and were excited.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧組委的官員看到了這期節目，感到非常興奮。

sentences.english: Jiang Xiaoyu , BOCOG Vice President Encourages Youngsters to Participate in Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧組委副主席蔣效愚鼓勵青少年參與奧運活動。

sentences.english: The regulations come into force as of the day of promulgation.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法解釋權歸交易會組委會，並於發佈之日起生效。

sentences.english: Successive previous customers can enjoy preferential measures, and please contact the organizing committee for details.
sentences.chinese: 歷屆老客戶可享受優惠措施，詳情請諮詢組委會。

sentences.english: A member of the Organizing Committee representing the international Federation.
sentences.chinese: 在奧組委中各單項國際組織的代表。

sentences.english: I accept the life accident insurance and medical insurance Organizing Committee insured for me.
sentences.chinese: 我接受組委會爲本人辦理的人身意外險和醫療險。

sentences.english: All are the sort of well-meaning and thoughtful films that the Academy likes best.
sentences.chinese: 全部是組委會最喜歡的那種善意的深思熟慮的電影。

sentences.english: The enterprises having attended the fair can enjoy preferential policies. Please contact the organizing committee for details.
sentences.chinese: 歷屆老客戶可享受優惠政策，詳情請諮詢組委會。

sentences.english: Already some members of the London Organizing Committee for the Olympic Games, or Locog, are damping public expectations.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦奧組委的一些成員已經在淡化公衆的期望。

sentences.english: Even the usually tongue-tied International Olympic Committee expressed regret at the remark.
sentences.chinese: 就連一向慎言的國際奧組委也對這句話表示遺憾。

sentences.english: The OCOG may establish a functional area dealing with Cultural Programme aspects.
sentences.chinese: 組委會可以成立專職部門負責這方面的事務。
